about.name: hfoldsty
about.caption: European Computer Modern font with old-style numerals and better kerning for guillemets.

description.abstract: The hfoldsty package provides virtual fonts for using oldstyle (0123456789) figures with the European Computer Modern fonts. It does a similar job as the `eco' package by Sebastian Kirsch but includes a couple of improvements, e.g., better kerning with guillemets, support for character protruding using the pdfcprot package, arbitrary font sizes in conjunction with fix-cm.sty.
